skillTree.localised_description: Whether Beorg strides forth to meet his enemies, or stands expecting their strongest warriors to come forth, those with him are utterly convinced of bloody victory.
Who needs a cumbersome blade when the perfect weapon is literally at your fingertips?
Maybe it is the near-constant state of regeneration that gives the hide a toughened sheen, almost impervious to claw, talon or blade.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Though he fights with heedless abandon, the furore of battle hones Beorg’s instincts to ensure the blood of his enemies spills more copiously than his own.

effects.description:
Replenishes 15% campaign movement range after winning a battle
	(Lord)

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

skillTree.localised_description: Though only Beorg carries the full shape of the bear, his kinsmen are also known for occasionally sprouting claws, snarling teeth, mane-like fur and bear-shaped muzzles.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -15% for Marauder Bearmen units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Marauder Bearmen units
	(Hero's army)

Passive ability: "Frenzy" for Marauder Bearmen units
	(Hero's army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Consumed by unholy bloodlust, these Chaos-tainted madmen have sown terror across a thousand battlefields for the esteem of their Gods and, of course, the sheer *love* of it all.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +15 for Marauder Bearmen units
	(Hero's army)

Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Marauder Bearmen units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

effects.description:
Attribute: Causes Fear for Marauder Bearmen units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: By the time one recognises Beorg's war cry, it is already too late.

related_attributes.bullet_text:
When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.

skillTree.localised_description: Beorg cares little for the so-called ’civilised’ world, but he nevertheless appreciates the fruits of civilisation's labour as he devours them.

effects.description:
Income from looting, sacking and razing settlements +25%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: The greatest of bears is endlessly savage, the Ursfjordlings know, for they regard their Chieftain as living proof of the greatest ursine bloodline.

effects.description: Attacks cause "Rattled" effect, reducing combat ability

skillTree.localised_description: Many are the dark horrors of twisted flesh and nightmares made real that the Ruinous Powers have visited upon the world, but few are quite as vicious.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Don't go anywhere near its mouth - in fact, don't even get within snapping distance if you value your limbs.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
It is never enough. The food, the drink, the slaughter. It is never, ever enough.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Blink and you die.
The bigger they are, the harder they fall.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Heed the howl of the Werekin! For vicious slaughter and bloody ruin are soon to follow!
A stalker of men and beasts alike, any unfortunate foe whose scent is caught is sure to meet a quick and agonising end.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 20% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

items.colour_text: This ancient, yellowed canine tooth is the sacred talisman of lordship among Beorg’s tribe, warding off blows that would otherwise harm its wearer.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 5% for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, Marauder Bearmen and Marauder Champions units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)
When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.localised_description: From the day Beorg received the Gift of the Were, singled out by the Dark Gods to lead his people, all the North would come to know that glorious carnage would follow.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.
